name: EvidenceVariableRole UTG-247 ChangeSet
title: EvidenceVariableRole UTG-247 ChangeSet
description: The role that the assertion variable plays.

concept.definition: variable represents a first of two measured variables to be used in a measured variable that is a mathematical operation of two measured variables.
variable represents a second of two measured variables to be used in a measured variable that is a mathematical operation of two measured variables.
variable represents a result of a mathematical operation of two measured variables.
